posts.content:
Just found some of these out from the trip we did in 2000 to the party held by VW I will scan a few more in over the days

The smaller of the two groups the morning after My selt and Steve looking at Barry the BarnDoor
My bus is the Grey Combi named Freddi

The two groups meet up after a short detour Terry Ellis and his Panel van Terry you still around ??

Barry the barndoor followed by Andys Bus Sorry andy forgot you last name

and one more as I have to do some work

That was a fantastic trip.

Does anyone remember the people in the van who lost a wheel and Terry Ellis (who was towing a folding caravan, I think, at the time) and I think it was Gordon stopped and helped recover it.

Hospitality was great.

Cat Scratch Fever played, anyone remember them?

I will have to sort out some pics.

Terry

Terry wrote:That was a fantastic trip.

I will have to sort out some pics.

Cat Scratch Fever! The best band to play at Vic Farm ever, where are you Dolman
